headline: Extra Space Storage price target lowered to $175 from $198 at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies analyst Jonathan Petersen lowered the firm’s price target on Extra Space Storage to $175 from $198 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm is “cautiously positive” on the self storage sector into 2025. It expects initial outlooks will be conservative, so Jefferies believes “there is no rush to buy ahead of the quarter.” However, any recovery in the housing market in 2025 will be met by renewed storage demand and upward revisions to guidance and estimates, the analyst tells inves
